net.kuujo.vertigo.cluster.data

Interface AsyncCollection<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The collection data type.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AsyncList<T>, AsyncQueue<T>, AsyncSet<T>

    public interface AsyncCollection<T>
    Asynchronous collection.
    Author:
    Jordan Halterman

    • Method Summary

      Adds a value to the collection.

      Clears all values from the collection.

        value - The value to add.
        doneHandler - An asynchronous handler to be called once complete.

      • contains

        void contains(Object value,
            org.vertx.java.core.Handler<org.vertx.java.core.AsyncResult<Boolean>> resultHandler)
        Checks whether the collection contains a value.
        Parameters:
        value - The value to check.
        resultHandler - An asynchronous handler to be called with the result indicating whether the collection contains the given value.

      • size

        void size(org.vertx.java.core.Handler<org.vertx.java.core.AsyncResult<Integer>> resultHandler)
        Gets the current collection size.
        Parameters:
        resultHandler - An asynchronous handler to be called with the collection size.

        Checks whether the collection is empty.
        Parameters:

        Clears all values from the collection.

        void clear(org.vertx.java.core.Handler<org.vertx.java.core.AsyncResult<Void>> doneHandler)
        Clears all values from the collection.
        Parameters:
        doneHandler - An asynchronous handler to be called once the collection has been cleared.
